articles.author: Munsif Vengattil, Aditya Kalra
articles.title: Exclusive: Pegatron in talks with Tata to sell its only India iPhone plant, sources say - Reuters
articles.description: Pegatron is in advanced talks to hand over control of its only iPhone manufacturing facility in India to the Tata Group, said two sources with direct knowledge, marking the Taiwanese firm's latest scale back of its Apple partnership.

articles.title: CEO salaries grew 40% on average in the past four years, Deloitte survey finds | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The survey also found that promoter CEOs have seen their compensation rise more quickly than professional CEOs.
